attributes.action: Call an election as he DOESN@T have a mandate to rule
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
He's a proxy PM and doesn't have the support of the British electorate to govern.
A law hould be passed to ensure that a proxy PM HAS to go to the electorate within 120 days

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
